## Installation

- Important: You must have installed the Node.js and Git

```bash
# clone it
$ git clone https://github.com/Wesley-AlvesRolim/React-Fundamentals.git

$ cd React-Fundamentals/

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

# Running scripts
$ npm start
```
